name: SE2-20 — THE FIRST SHORE'S KEY
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Baie Lazare (return), Mahé. The loop returns where it began.
The first shore keeps the last key.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: key sigil in foam; ring completes the loop.
properties.clue:
The loop returns where it began.
The first shore keeps the last key.
properties.visual_description: Same bay at dawn; chest partly unearthed; skull-and-sabers watermark; lantern glow on sand; compass ring closing.
